# File vendor/riddle/lib/riddle/client.rb, line 144
    def reset
      # defaults
      @offset         = 0
      @limit          = 20
      @max_matches    = 1000
      @match_mode     = :all
      @sort_mode      = :relevance
      @sort_by        = ''
      @weights        = []
      @id_range       = 0..0
      @filters        = []
      @group_by       = ''
      @group_function = :day
      @group_clause   = '@group desc'
      @group_distinct = ''
      @cut_off        = 0
      @retry_count    = 0
      @retry_delay    = 0
      @anchor         = {}
      # string keys are index names, integer values are weightings
      @index_weights  = {}
      @rank_mode      = :proximity_bm25
      @max_query_time = 0
      # string keys are field names, integer values are weightings
      @field_weights  = {}
      @timeout        = 0
      @overrides      = {}
      @select         = "*"
    end
